items.title: Looking ahead at Notre Dame Football’s roster management for 2026
items.summary: With Notre Dame’s 2025 college football season at an abrupt end, we can start to focus on roster management and the possibilities to come with NFL Draft entries and transfer portal transactions. Notre Dame’s recruiting class for 2026 is signed and set, and with the exception of the increased likelihood of 2027 QB Teddy Jarrard […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Stats: 2006 Georgia Tech Game Review
items.summary: Notre Dame football kicked off the 2006 season with an away game at Georgia Tech.  The 2005 Irish team finished with a 9-3 overall record and Georgia Tech’s prior squad had finished with a 7-5 season.  It was the first time that the two programs had faced off since the Gator Bowl in 1999.  Tech […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Recruiting: 4-Star North Carolina cornerback Xavier Hasasn commits to the Irish
items.summary: Despite all of the noise out there, Notre Dame football is still putting in the work and continually carving a place for itself as one of the best programs in the country. To do that, the irish have hit the recruiting trail hard to bring in the best talent to South Bend. On Monday, 4-Star […]

items.title: Notre Dame running back Jeremiyah Love wins the Doak Walker Award
items.summary: One of the few bright spots for Notre Dame Football in the month of December has been Jeremiyah Love. The junior running back is well on his way to becoming a unanimous All-American and is in New York to be part of the Heisman Trophy ceremony. On Friday, he became the first Notre Dame running […]

items.title: Is Notre Dame Football about to lose another assistant coach?
items.summary: With Notre Dame’s football season over following the college football playoff snub and the decision to play in any bowl games, the focus has turned towards roster management and staff retention. The former is something that still needs time and other developments, but the latter is definitely underway. Notre Dame just lost linebackers coach, Max […]
